name: The Undercroft 12
description:
Our 12th installment of the Undercroft contains a handful of oddities that will hopefully peak your interest

  • Sándor Gebei takes us through the City of Gallowsport, its local landmarks and familar faces, as well as the ships that dock in port, the treasures they bring, and the mysteries of the unknown.
  • And Chance Philips tells us a tall tale of The Mountain That is a Man and Also God.
  • Whilst Daniel Sell provides us an array of Dwarfen Trinkets and Artifacts one may find in possesion of any Dwarf.
  • Lastly Luke Le Monignan tells us the Legacy of Vazimak the Thanaturge and the terrible mnemocrypt's created  by the wizards of old.
